16#include "system.h"
17#include "cmpbuf.h"
18
19/* Least common multiple of two buffer sizes A and B. */
20
21size_t
22buffer_lcm (a, b)
23 size_t a, b;
24{
25 size_t m, n, r;
26
27 /* Yield reasonable values if buffer sizes are zero. */
28 if (!a)
29 return b ? b : 8 * 1024;
30 if (!b)
31 return a;
32
33 /* n = gcd (a, b) */
34 for (m = a, n = b; (r = m % n) != 0; m = n, n = r)
35 continue;
36
37 return a/n * b;
38}
39
